document_data.caption: Thought broadcast forces someone to reveal their hiding place.
document_data.name: Thought Broadcast
document_data.mainbody: '''''Thought broadcast''''' was a [[divine magic|divine]] [[alteration]] [[spell]] from the [[thought sphere]] that allowed a subject's thoughts to be experienced by others.
document_data.Effects: While this spell was active the subject's thoughts were broadcasted to others within {{SI|90|ft|long=yes}}. This could be extremely useful or hindering depending on whether or not the subject was a willing participant. The spell's [[magic]] crossed any language barriers so the thoughts could be understood by all races.
document_data.Components: In addition to [[verbal]] and [[somatic component]]s, this spell required as a [[material component]]s a small balloon to cast. The balloon was inflated during the casting and then consumed.
document_data.History: The ''[[Scepter of Mystra]]'', a relic of the [[Mystra]]n faith, could cast the ''thought broadcast'' spell.{{cite book/Prayers from the Faithful|77-80}}
